channel.title: drawing on Lilie Artsci's blog
channel.description: Recent content in drawing on Lilie Artsci's blog

item.title: Psycho-cat
item.description: Hey! Here is a small drawing of my cat, whose favorite posture is to lie on the bed. She’s often in that weird mood in-between cuddly and psycho-cat, lying a trap full of claws when we try to pet it :)
